vendor_name: Sheraton Samoa Aggie Grey's Hotel & Bungalows
title: Waterfront Luxury in the Heart of Apia, Samoa’s Tropical Capital
description: Discover the Treasured Islands of the South Pacific from a luxurious launchpad: the newly renovated Sheraton Samoa Aggie Grey’s Hotel & Bungalows, housed in a colonial property dating back to 1930. Stay in the heart of the vibrant capital Apia and embrace the tropical vibes with daily breakfast, three dinners during your stay, a nightly drink each, six 30-minute massages between two at the blissful on-site spa, return airport transfers. Plus up to two kids (aged 12 years and under) stay free with breakfast included.
